localProps.data:
# ClassMap<TClass> Class

Namespace: [CsvHelper.Configuration](/api/CsvHelper.Configuration)

Maps class members to CSV fields.

```cs
public abstract class ClassMap<TClass> : ClassMap
```

Inheritance Object -> ClassMap -> ClassMap<TClass>

## Constructors
  |  
- | -
ClassMap() | Creates an instance of ``CsvHelper.Configuration.ClassMap<TClass>`` .

## Methods
  |  
- | -
Map<TMember>(Expression<Func<TClass, TMember>>, Boolean) | Maps a member to a CSV field.
References<TClassMap>(Expression<Func<TClass, Object>>, Object[]) | Meant for internal use only. Maps a member to another class map. When this is used, accessing a property through sub-property mapping later won't work. You can only use one or the other. When using this, ConvertUsing will also not work.
